price: 10. Prends en patience ce qu’ils disent et déserte-les de la désertion la plus sereine !
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamīlan
